籤詩版本二:
Ngazalelwa emndenini ocebile kusukela ebuntwaneni, yonke into ephambi kwami ​​ihlale iwubukhazikhazi
Ibhande Legolide Elibubende Ulinikwe Wena Mhlonishwa, Lizoduma Umhlaba Wonke
詩意:
Le hexagram iwuphawu lwesango likadrako elivuliwe.
Konke kuzoshintsha kube ngcono.
解曰: Iziboshwa zixolelwe. Ukugula kusho ukuthula. U-Longmen unethuba lokuhlangana. Idume kuyo yonke inhloko-dolobha.
籤詩故事一:
◇ULuo Tong uyamhlonipha
Ubukhosi BamaTang babuthana ngokugcwele ukuze bathulise uMlandeli WaseNyakatho. UMbusi u-Taizong wanquma ukuhola lolu hambo mathupha, kodwa wavaleleka eMuyang City, ngakho u-Cheng Yaojin wabuyela e-Central Plains ukuyohlenga amasosha. Ngeshwa, wabanjwa amasosha Abalandeli BaseNyakatho . U-Cheng Yaojin wayeqephuza futhi enekhono lokukhuluma. INkosazana u-Tu Lu yase-Beifan yathembisa ukumvumela ukuthi abuyele e-Central Plains ukuze acele ukuqiniswa.
Emqhudelwaneni wezobuciko bokulwa, kwabuthwa ojenene abazonqoba inyakatho.U-Luo Tong oneminyaka eyishumi nesikhombisa ubudala waphuma phambili futhi wathatha izintambo zohambo oluya enyakatho.
(Isisho esithi "Luotong sweeps the north" siyisingathekiso sensizwa ephumelelayo)
聖意: Thandazela ikhaya nendlu, zikhulekele, thandazela ingcebo, inhlanhla ekwindla nasebusika, inhlanhla ebhizinisini, umshado, kanye nenhlanhla e-Liujia, abahamba ngezinyawo besifazane, thandazela ukuvikelwa kwamasimu, izikelemu, izinga eliphakathi, imfuyo eyisithupha. , izinga eliphakathi, sesha abantu, amacala omphakathi, ukufuduka okulungile, impahla elahlekile, izifo zaseMpumalanga, i-Anshan grave auspiciousness
